name: Cashmere Mist Deodorant
categories: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Body Wash & Shower Gel
about: What it is:An effective deodorant and antiperspirant infused with the soft Cashmere Mist scent..Fragrance Family:Floral.Scent Type:Powdery Floral.Key Notes:Moroccan Jasmine, Lily of the Valley, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:Treat your body to the ultimate layer of protection. An essential part of your Cashmere Mist body ritual, this deodorant combines essences of Moroccan jasmine, lily of the valley, and warm sandalwood for a beautifully soft, floral scent. The advanced formula reduces perspiration, keeping you feeling dry and smelling fresh.
ingredients: -Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex Gly 15.4%: Helps keep skin dry....Cyclopentasiloxane, Stearyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ppg-14 Butyl Ether, Dimethicone, Talc, Cashmere Mist Fragrance, Silica, Peg-8 Distearate, Allantoin, Maltodextrin, Corn Starch Modified, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Geraniol, Isoeugenol, Eugenol, Bht.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I've tried so many deodorants including the medical ones and mens. Nothing has taken away my body odor the way this has and it lasts for days. Worth the price but lets see how long it lasts.

reviews.review_title: I guess I wear $50 deodorant now...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because of the great reviews and I have been on the market for a more luxe deodorant. After trying all three Sol De Janeiro deodorants and hating them, I was about to return to my lame Secret go-to. Was hesitant to try this because of the price but bought it during the sale and I will never look back! This works AND it smells so so so good. It is light, feminine, musky, and creamy. It's subtle enough that it won't interfere with your scent of the day (which is very important to a frangrance-phile like me!). Will likely continue to purchase this baby despite the eyebrow-raising price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because everyone said it smells amazing. It smells like musty baby powder. I hated it at first but then got used to it and now kinda like it. However, when it comes to how well it works, I give it 5 stars. It lasts all day on me but I do wish it was slightly less powdery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent on this and it lasts all day.  My real problem with the deodorant is the cost and the dispenser.  No matter how I use this deodorant, I feel like I waste product.  If you dispense too much at a time, the deodorant will break off and crumble.  To stop that, you have to only twist up small amounts at a time but even using that technique there is still lots of product at the end that you cannot use.  For $30+ the dispenser should be better!

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it. This is a higher end deodorant. So it does last, I do not smell any body odor. But the scent is like a gross scent that's like a baby powder strong scent instead of a luxurious scent.
